item.title: Comment on 500+ Posts Later, StartupBend Founders Close Up Blog and Look to What’s Next by Julie h

item.description: Thank you for this amazing contribution to our community.

item.title: Comment on 500+ Posts Later, StartupBend Founders Close Up Blog and Look to What’s Next by Eric Walton
item.dc:creator: Eric Walton
item.description: Kelly, thank you so much! Before moving here, I read your posts and they helped me to stay resolute on my decision to come to Bend, and I am forever grateful. Now being here 2 years and our 2 businesses still going, we can't agree more...being an entrepreneur has allowed us to help so many people. Here's to many more!
item.content:encoded: Kelly, thank you so much! Before moving here, I read your posts and they helped me to stay resolute on my decision to come to Bend, and I am forever grateful. Now being here 2 years and our 2 businesses still going, we can’t agree more…being an entrepreneur has allowed us to help so many people. Here’s to many more!

item.description: Thanks Kelly! Thanks James! I can't believe it's been six years already! Best of luck for all things upcoming...
item.content:encoded:
Thanks Kelly! Thanks James!
I can’t believe it’s been six years already! Best of luck for all things upcoming…
